item.description:
What is Adzzoo

Just to let you know I am hosting a small training on using Adzzoo to help optimize your pressence online.

I will explain how we can guarentee front page exposure on Google.

I will go through the components of our campaigns.

If you are looking for more ways to help your clients or your own business -Adzzoo can help

Come to the Thayer Library in Braintree Ma tomorrow night (Tuesday the 19th)


Thayer Public Library - 798 Washington St., Braintree, MA 02184 - 781-710-2787
I have been trying to get a more centralized Boston Location for general networking etc. so if any of you have ideas or access to a meeting space please let me know. But I wanted to let you all know about this meeting just in case you can come.

Thanks so much, Hope you are all having a fabulous New Year!

Jane Cournan
781-710-2787
item.name: SEM for Small to Medium Businesses Info about Adzzoo
